roleset.name: trying out for a role
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, audition-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Personally , I never hear where auditions for Idol will be held , but maybe I 'm not paying attention to that since I would n't qualify , and I do n't live near a city where auditions might take place .

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: For his audition with Murray Campbell, Jack was to play Ray Brown's solo 'One Bass Hit'.
